name: Sandy Carter
body:
# Sandy Carter
Sandy Carter is a 25 year-old developer from Montreal. As both an in-house and freelance developer, he has several years of experience with planning, designing, developing, packaging and maintaining applications. Sandy loves gaming, good food, software, Linux and C++. He is available for hire and freelance.

[Email](mailto:bwrsandman@gmail.com), [Github](https://github.com/bwrsandman), [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/sandy-carter/21/16b/772), [Arch Linux](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?SeB=m&K=bwrsandman)
***

## Game Dev Projects
### [OgreENet](https://github.com/bwrsandman/OgreENet)
An ENet wrapper for networking with the Ogre3D graphics engine.
### [OpenMW](https://github.com/bwrsandman/openmw) contribution
An unofficial open source engine reimplementation of the game Morrowind.
### [Stream](https://github.com/bwrsandman/Stream-Game)
A Unity3D game prototype presented at the 2013 Ubisoft Academia inter-university contest. Stream is a 3rd person puzzle game that uses short-distance teleportation and time travel as a mechanic to solve puzzles, borrowing visual elements from Dead Space and squad management from Rainbow Six.
### [SCarter Engine](https://github.com/bwrsandman/SCarter-Engine)
A GTK3+ based glsl sandbox. Includes particle effects, glxgears, morphing shaders and an implementation of the Doom 3 MD5 mesh and animation system.
### [Cubic](https://github.com/bwrsandman/Cubic-The-Game)
An XNA, turned to MonoGame puzzle game that combines the quick shape matching of Tetris with addictive multiplayer elements.

## CyanogenMod
### ZTE N762 (Roamer)
A port of the roamer device to cyanogenMod 7 according to the [CM porting instructions](http://wiki.cyanogenmod.org/w/Doc:_porting_intro).
* [Device](https://github.com/bwrsandman/android_device_zte_roamer)
* [Vendor](https://github.com/bwrsandman/android_vendor_zte_roamer)
* [Kernel](https://github.com/bwrsandman/android_kernel_zte_roamer)
### [CMDevCenter](https://github.com/bwrsandman/CMDevCenter) contribution
A GTK based application that facilitates fetching the source, contributing patches and compiling CyanogenMod for various supported CM devices.

## Packaging
* [enet-pp-hg](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/enet-pp-hg): A very lightweight C++ wrapper for the ENet networking library, mercurial version.
* [monodevelop-monogame-addin-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/enet-pp-hg): MonoDevelop Project and File Templates for Monogame
* [ogitor-hg](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/ogitor-hg) Scene editing framework for Ogre3D, git version.
* [ogrebullet-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/ogrebullet-git) Bullet Physics wrapper for OGRE, git version.
* [ogreenet-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/ogreenet-git) OgreENet is an ENet wrapper for the Ogre3D graphics engine, git version.
* [ogremeshy](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/ogremeshy) A tool for viewing OGRE mesh files.
* [openmw](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/openmw) An open-source engine reimplementation for the role-playing game Morrowind.
* [openmw-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/openmw-git) An open-source engine reimplementation for the role-playing game Morrowind, git version.
* [pandora-libraries-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/pandora-libraries-git) Basic collection of functions and tools to make working Pandora-specific operations easier, git version.
* [pandora-misc-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/pandora-misc-git) Collection of functions and tools to make working Pandora-specific operations easier, git version.
* [pokemon-online-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/pokemon-online-git) Online Pokemon Battle Simulator, git version.
* [python2-dialog](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/python2-dialog) Package for interfacing with dialog.
* [tslib-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/tslib-git) Touchscreen access library, git version.
* [lib32-tslib-git](https://github.com/bwrsandman/pkgbuild/tree/master/lib32-tslib-git): Touchscreen access libraryi (32-bit), git version.
linaria A port of Terraria to Linux.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
